website_summaries.verdict: Test kit provides results for many different kinds of mold, and you instantly get results, and send for lab conformation.
pros: Get results for 32 different mold types within 5 minutes
The kit includes a postage-paid mailer and swabs if you want to have your test result verified by a lab
cons: The home results can be a little hard to read

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: Test came up negative for anything, wife was still sick so I hired a professional. He found 3 types of mold that were listed on the paperwork that it should have found.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Test confirmed by professional testing service
customer_reviews.text: When our little rent house tested positive for mold, according to a company specializing in that service, I installed a dehumidifier and an ozone mold killer, both bought from Amazon. A month or two later, I bought this and ran the test. The test showed no mold remained, so I called the professionals out, and they confirmed it. The test is at least accurate in giving an "all clear".
customer_reviews.author: D. Eckman

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work
customer_reviews.text: Test doesn't work, tested in a rather toxic environment, this test said no mold spores of either type were present. Tested the same dust from the same area with a different test to send to a lab, showed up positive for both stachybotrys & aspergillus. (the 2 types this test is supposed to identify) Don't cheap out just go the lab route if you want to check for mold, besides this only claims to pick up 2 types of mold when there are 5 types known to cause health issues.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Almost like a pregnancy test
customer_reviews.text: Almost like a pregnancy test. Easy to use. Had been getting sick, gaining weight for almost 2 years. My brother told me about this & I strongly believe it saved my life. I woke up one morning lethargic, drunk feeling, couldn’t focus, etc.. and found through this that indeed, mold was present, both types. I never went back and within 2 weeks my bronchial symptoms were gone, I’d list 10lbs, and felt much better! Only thing is, I wish the line would show brighter so there’s less of a question..
customer_reviews.author: rebekah star livingston

customer_reviews.title: Swindled
customer_reviews.text: Initial results come back positive and then when you pay the $150.00 to send it to the lab, everything comes back negative. I don't recommend this product to anyone looking for true results.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Easy to do, and fast results while you watch the test strip---like a pregnancy test home kit.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use and alleviates your fears, if you suspect household mold---and it shows "negative" good results! We had a moldy looking spot near our indoor a/c air handler===it wasn't any bad mold, just dirty grime from ducting moisture. However, I took the test to my workplace and swab-sampled some fuzzy-looking a/c vent mold near our cubicle and IT WAS "Positive" for Black Mold!! Now the environmental guys are cleaning all the vents and a/c filters.
customer_reviews.author: B47Stratojet

customer_reviews.title: It is not useful for testing airbord mold in a room
customer_reviews.text: It is of limited usefulness. If you apply it directly to where there is mold it will give a positive reading. It is not useful for testing airbord mold in a room.
customer_reviews.author: pape

customer_reviews.title: Saved from buying a house with mold.
customer_reviews.text: Found mold in house we were going to buy.people renting were all getting respiratory infections and always sick.5 year old child in household and mother both got asthma while living there.father worked about dusk to Dawn so he wasn't sick.now that he had broken both legs he had noticed constantly being congested.Thank God for this testing kit!! I pray for their recovery.
customer_reviews.author: Charles Rome

customer_reviews.title: Yeah...No
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were simple enough but for the money you’d think that you’d get something that works. Then they want an additional $29 per sample to send to a lab for results. I got multiple brands to test them out and others come with the lab test included with prices the same if not lower than what this one costs. Pass on this one!
customer_reviews.author: Creepydude

customer_reviews.title: Insanely accurate
customer_reviews.text: I sadly have had my run in with toxic mold a few times now, and used this test with my previous moldy rental unit. I'm severely allergic to toxic mold so I know when I begin to have symptoms, I need to order this test. First time I used it, it came back positive for both toxic types so I sent out the lab analysis. I then ordered a very expensive mold expert to come do an air sample just to be sure, and I could not believe how accurate this lab was to the insanely expensive mold guy's lab. Almost identical. I will never hire another professional and will continue with this test.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Home test is okay, recommend sending to lab.
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I are currently renovating our bathroom and found mold on the drywall behind the tile. The test says you will receive results in 15 minutes, but it showed up about an hour after, and wasn't very clear on if it was a positive result. So, we opted to pay the additional $30 or so to have their lab test it. It found toxic mold. I wish the home test was more clear, but the results from the lab were quick and easy to understand, so it worked out in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren D

customer_reviews.title: Put my mind at ease
customer_reviews.text: I was concerned I had black mold in my bathroom after a pipe burst and I had to have all the flooring replaced. This put my mind at ease. The only thing that bugged me is that there was only one swan with the wetting bulb on it. Therefore I did not run the other test.
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: I wasted my money on this
customer_reviews.text: This test did nothing. I did a sample of multiple areas and the test showed that the results were negative. I had to have professional testers come in and the results were overwhelmingly positive. I wasted my money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: Please note this is not an issue with the seller. This is an issue with the product. After following all the steps, the pen will not drip when squeezed. Rather the fluid rises to the bulb section. I tried many different ways to get the pen to drip it would not. The item is non returnable now.
customer_reviews.author: Albert

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not sure I had figured out how to read the results, Seemed a bit ambiguous.
customer_reviews.author: MustangMan

customer_reviews.title: Peace of mind, and narrow down the possibilities which gave me direction
customer_reviews.text: We had a leak in a finish basement office. We thought we had mold, but this test says no. That mens it's dust because I can't breath down there. So I'mm gonna take samples of the dust and send it off to the lab. I will probably have to have a pro come in and take a air sample. But once I know then I can clean off the 1,000 sq ft area that has been finish off and haven't been able to use it.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Williams

customer_reviews.title: Did not work
customer_reviews.text: I swabbed the actual mold & the test came back negative. Apparently it does not work.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only good for an emergency
customer_reviews.text: It is alright. It is very vague on exactly how to test the best places, and one of the tests came out unreadable. You also have to pay 25 dollars a stick to send in the samples it cannot detect in the 2 main tests, which are necessary because you need to test more than one area. If you don't have a huge mold issue you won't really be able to tell without spending the extra money for lab results
customer_reviews.author: Jason M.

customer_reviews.title: Defective
customer_reviews.text: This test was useless. I followed the instruction perfectly, but the control line never changed color.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Helps make an informed decision on how to treat the problem
customer_reviews.text: After a leak in a new bathroom that flooded a bedroom and new hardwood, we decided to use this test after mold was found under the floating hardwood on the cork underlay. The test was simple to use and worked like a home pregnancy test. Results were clear and gave me some peace of mind that I wasn’t dealing with “black” mold. We opted to use a mold remediation solution without going through a costly service. The test helped us make a informed decision of whether to use professionals to address the mold (we would have if it tested positive) or to use mold abatement products carefully and according to directions.
customer_reviews.author: E. Schlough

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: After scanning the QR code that came with the product to view the instruction video I was able to easily perform the test and know for certain, according to the results, that my basement did have aspergillus / penicillium but not stachhybotrys. Would recommend it to know if I should consult with a professional.
customer_reviews.author: ck927

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work, Couldn't get it to work. Don't waste your money
customer_reviews.text: First off, I couldn't get the sample test to work, it took me 20 min to finally get the fluid from the bulb to the sample, then nothing on the indicator strips... in the garbage, I called a pro.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Thresher

customer_reviews.title: I gave this five stars because it says I didn't ...
customer_reviews.text: I gave this five stars because it says I didn't have any mold in my home. But if I do have mold in my home and still don't know it...then I guess it deserves zero stars but I don't know it...
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia P Lee

customer_reviews.title: Didn't work
customer_reviews.text: This test did not detect any mold in my home. A professional test detected very high levels of unsafe mold. Thanks for nothing.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin A Hlad

customer_reviews.title: Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: It's real easy to test and quick results so you will know if you have a bad mold problem and need to take further action in your home. If your home shows any sign of mold I would recommend this product to test if nothing more than just peace of mind.
customer_reviews.author: mary wells

customer_reviews.title: Quick and easy
customer_reviews.text: My apartment had tested highly positive for Aspergillus mold. After treating it, i tested my most important papers and they were negative. This test is great for a quick mold test for 2 types of toxic mold. Good directions on how to use the kit. You also have an option to send it for more extensive testing.
customer_reviews.author: Jen-fur

customer_reviews.title: results were vague. I called the company about the ...
customer_reviews.text: results were vague. I called the company about the result and they said to buy more and keep testing. I understand it is just a home kit, but it is an expensive one to buy a bunch of. It would be cheaper in the long run to just hire someone to test it professionally.
customer_reviews.author: tbm

customer_reviews.title: Works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.text: Did the test and it worked just as expected. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Pickle Rick

customer_reviews.title: Dud not work for me
customer_reviews.text: This test came out negative. After getting a professional out, I did indeed have a ton of mold. I had to move.
customer_reviews.author: Dee K.

customer_reviews.title: Not sure what to believe...
customer_reviews.text: Was almost 100% we had airborne mold in the room tested. We were just trying to figure out what kind and how severe. Both tests, however, were negative. I’m not convinced the tests actually worked. Many other reviews reported high levels of success, so I could be wrong. Unfortunately, I’m left feeling like I don’t have an answer and can’t really say one way or another.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: We were using these as an initial field test to ...
customer_reviews.text: We were using these as an initial field test to determine if a lab test was necessary. We got two false negatives and one false positive. Do not trust the results from this test.
customer_reviews.author: Cincypantera

customer_reviews.title: This was a complete waste of time and money
customer_reviews.text: This was a complete waste of time and money. I did everything exactly as instructed and the asp/pen results are invalid. Of course, you can send the swabs into their lab but that is an additional charge.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn Briscoe

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting
customer_reviews.text: Delivered item appeared used as box was open and this mysterious brown gunk was all over everything. Disgusting who knows what I was exposed to
customer_reviews.author: Natalie

customer_reviews.title: Possible late return? Please
customer_reviews.text: After finally changing my shower head we realized the issue was not mood and did. It use the test... :). Can I still return unopened item?
customer_reviews.author: Maria Rudnicki

customer_reviews.title: Mold or No Mold
customer_reviews.text: The test kit worked as the instructions said. It's a one time use. We did not send it to a lab, so we can't vouch on its accuracy, but it showed we did not have mold. We only tested the dust in the living room.
customer_reviews.author: Leslie B

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work.
customer_reviews.text: When I received this I followed all directions step by step and the test didn’t even run. The liquid should have run across the test strip and it never moved from the starting area. And to send in samples is another $29 per sample. Didn’t work and had to buy something else
customer_reviews.author: Kailey

customer_reviews.title: Bad results.
customer_reviews.text: Thought we had mold. Could see it growing on the corner of the floor where the AC leaked for two weeks. Result was negative. Had a professional come in a week later and confirmed it was mold.
customer_reviews.author: AngryIRSAgent

customer_reviews.title: It gave me peace of mind
customer_reviews.text: For what this product does, it's an ok product. Just wish is was less expensive. But it gave me peace of mind knowing there wasnt toxic mold present. And it's easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Just says you have some kind of mold but not how bad it is or what kind. You have to pay more money for a full report.
customer_reviews.author: Rb

customer_reviews.title: Great buy if you think you have a mold problem ...
customer_reviews.text: Showed asp mold as positive. Confirmed by retesting with a professional. Great buy if you think you have a mold problem and want unbiased opinion
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Only the English language instructions
customer_reviews.text: We cannot rate this product. We had to return it because instructions are only in English. We need a product that offers instructions in Spanish.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: this is a great test... it was easy to use as long as you ensure you find the instructions that are folded inside and follow them. I had a positive test and I did NOT verify it with a professional. It was all I needed for my situation.
customer_reviews.author: GiftGiver

customer_reviews.title: Will hire a professional
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions given. I just don't feel confident that this was "enough" solution in comparison to how many swabs are provided.
customer_reviews.author: Felicia Ford

customer_reviews.title: Fast and super easy
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to use and quick, accurate results. Easy to interpret.
customer_reviews.author: Marina G

customer_reviews.title: Awesome little kit:)
customer_reviews.text: I found what looked to be like mold in our master bathroom and thanks to this at home test it came out positive for asp/pen strain. The directions were easy to follow and the testing strips are easy to read. I am very pleased with this purchase and I am glad I know what I am dealing with and now can go about resolving my mold issue. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Laura K.

customer_reviews.title: it showed negative - but we knew there was mold ...
customer_reviews.text: it showed negative - but we knew there was mold there b/c of my response when leaving the residence. i think it may have been in the AC ductwork
customer_reviews.author: Rosemary

customer_reviews.title: Lab test doesn't match home test.
customer_reviews.text: The test came up positive for black mold and then when we sent away to the lab the results were negative. Also, the amazon add says the lab test is about $40 and they charged $90.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Hitchcock

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: For someone like myself that's impatient, this will give you a quick answer. If you want more answers, it does give you the options. Felt it was just OK.
customer_reviews.author: KimakaDogMom

customer_reviews.title: Its ok
customer_reviews.text: Its ok. You can only truly test one area. It has two test strips but, only one mixing tube. So if you don't want cross contamination you have to be creative.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: What i said in review
customer_reviews.text: I’ve used these before. They’re worth the price because you dont have to wait for specific information.
customer_reviews.author: Randy

customer_reviews.title: This product worked great. I took the sample from inside my heater/AC ...
customer_reviews.text: This product worked great. I took the sample from inside my heater/AC unit and five minutes later I knew I had Aspergillus/Penicillium and not Stachybotrys. What a relief!
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Bridgeman

customer_reviews.title: almost instant information
customer_reviews.text: I swabbed the suspect spot and ruled out 2 dangerous molds with in an hour. I don't know what the mold I have is but it is not either of the dangerous 2. I can treat the area and repair the wall without worry. Hopefully we have the water problem solved so everything is well again.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Behrends

customer_reviews.title: I would have liked it more if you could do more samples
customer_reviews.text: I would have liked it more if you could do more samples. Seems a bit expensive to me for just what it does.
customer_reviews.author: David Michael Xanatos

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Pretty easy to use. Simple instructions & quality product. Tested negative for both.
customer_reviews.author: This Guy

customer_reviews.title: Does what it claims to do.
customer_reviews.text: Glad I purchased this item. Gave me peace of mind knowing I don't have black mold. A little pricey but I think worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Garland

customer_reviews.title: Easy and quick home mold test kit
customer_reviews.text: Easy to collect the sample, do the mold analyses and read the results
customer_reviews.author: KindleJ, Customer

customer_reviews.title: super fast and convenient
customer_reviews.text: never seen it test positive, but seems to function ....
customer_reviews.author: anon

customer_reviews.title: Check for mold
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this because i suspected mold in the dump i rent. Worked easily and perfectly. Out of the 2 tests 1 came back positive. Not good obviously but it did its job.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie  mills

customer_reviews.title: DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received both tests in the package, however, one was negative and the other inconclusive????? Total waste of money and I STILL don't know what this mold is.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Didnt do much for me because I checked on a mold spot on purpose and it didnt register.
customer_reviews.author: RickT

customer_reviews.title: Now I’m aware of the results
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with the result. Now I’m aware there is presence of black molds in our apartment and need to resolve this. Just make it sure not to pour all the liquid in the test because it will spill out!
customer_reviews.author: Mona

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and quick results
customer_reviews.text: Bought two of these to test our bathrooms. Very easy to use and quick results. Unfortunately, one bathroom tested positive for one of the tests so we will be seeking further confirmation and treatment. Thank you for a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Heatherbell

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, but a little confusing
customer_reviews.text: We were a little confused on the results because a line showed up right at the cutoff time. We are probably going to have to purchase a more in-depth test.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Really excellent; easy to use, fast, no questions mold test. Works well
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Accurate. Identified two different strains and helped me get ...
customer_reviews.text: Accurate. Identified two different strains and helped me get my roof fixed by the Landlord. The PDF's they sent me look very professional. This guy probably wouldn't fix his own mother's roof!
customer_reviews.author: Jimbow

customer_reviews.title: Great product for at home mold detection.
customer_reviews.text: This product is wonderful for people who may have mold at home. It provides a quick insight into whether there is mold. Very easy to use and to interpret the test results. Comes with a prepaid envelope and extra swabs to send to the lab for testing (at an extra fee)
customer_reviews.author: Guillem Perez

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: This worked well when evaluating a new home for purchase. The inspection company only did a surface mold check visually and because I'm allergic to mold I knew I needed more! My son was able to do this for me as I was still living across country. Easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Seren

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: for my families safety it is the best one I could find
customer_reviews.author: Gary Leon Miller

customer_reviews.title: Can  NOT rely on results!
customer_reviews.text: Test came back negative but another family member insisted on professional testing which detected the presence of both kinds of toxic mold tested by this kit! A total waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: D. C. Haber

customer_reviews.title: Confusing !
customer_reviews.text: For the average person the instructions seem very complicated. I found it hard to use and hard to understand the results.
customer_reviews.author: Katina Mullen

customer_reviews.title: 1 defective sample test!
customer_reviews.text: Good product but I revived one defective “Stachybotrys” did not get a reading after the 5 drops.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Le

customer_reviews.title: Very easy to use and a quick response
customer_reviews.text: Tested inside a home for mold. Very easy to use, instructions were clear, and results were within minutes and not days. I do recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Darla Conover

customer_reviews.title: Fast and easy results
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping and easy to use. I got my question on mold answered right away without having to wait for a lab analysis. I was able to treat the area with a positive test immediately after I got the results. This seems like a high price to pay but it isn't when you look at the add on fees for lab analysis with the cheaper tests and then considering the wait time afterward for results. This test does offer additional lab analysis for $26 per test if you want to take that extra step. I didn't feel it was necessary. I would buy this again.
customer_reviews.author: MAC

customer_reviews.title: Does what it says!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product out thete that gives you results in 5 minutes! Awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Beach

customer_reviews.title: No mold!
customer_reviews.text: Worked great! I opened the box, not one bit of mold. Only tests. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Nuggy Bupples

customer_reviews.title: This kit is easy to use but you can only test one or ...
customer_reviews.text: This kit is easy to use but you can only test one or two areas. You also need to send the swabs out to a lab for additional testing to find out for sure what the mold is.
customer_reviews.author: G. Woodward

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: I have some health issues which made it a little difficult to collect the samples.
customer_reviews.author: Harold King

customer_reviews.title: Good Simple Test for now
customer_reviews.text: Simple, easy to use. Put my mind at ease for now but I will be purchasing a higher quality test.
customer_reviews.author: Gail Farrell

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Was easy to figure out and made me feel much more reassured about our new home.
customer_reviews.author: Miranda Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Instant answers to the question: Is our home making ...
customer_reviews.text: Instant answers to the question: Is our home making us and our pets seriously ill? I've called products "lifesavers" before, but in this case, it's true.
customer_reviews.author: Kate Martin

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This product arrived on time. It was a surprise for me to finally get something that I needed and it was so easy to use and the results were available within minutes. I would recommend this product and seller.
customer_reviews.author: lovy

customer_reviews.title: 5 minutes to Peace of Mind
customer_reviews.text: We are suffering through water in our basement. We can see mold growing and I have been very concerned about my health, my husband's health, and that of our pets. I bought this kit and tested the mold. It's not toxic!! I can't even describe how this is one weight off my mind. Thank you, IAQ, for giving me some peace of mind. This test kit is very easy to use, basic step by step instructions. Quick results without trouble! The two tests come packaged in sealed plastic, so you know it hasn't been tampered with or messed up. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth2019

customer_reviews.title: Only tests for 2 types of mold
customer_reviews.text: This test works well but it Only tests for 2 types of mold. My son is allergic to many more types of mold than just 2.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked quickly and the directions were easy to follow
customer_reviews.text: Worked quickly and the directions were easy to follow. Had my results in about 20 mins after opening the package. I liked all of the options on how to test.
customer_reviews.author: Licher

customer_reviews.title: Used it in my new apartment
customer_reviews.text: I would say for the price this is a good buy just to be safe. Used it in my apartment because I was worried and results were negative but now I am at peace.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: Test reports come super quick
customer_reviews.text: Tom helped me thru the steps and I watched a few videos and sent all 3 swabs to the Bio lab. Sent them on Thurs and received my results Friday afternoon. Thanks for all your help.
customer_reviews.author: walter d stoklosa

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great for quick testing with out having to mail away for results
customer_reviews.author: Rosanne

customer_reviews.title: All my tests ended up negative which was a HUGE ...
customer_reviews.text: All my tests ended up negative which was a HUGE peace of mind during my bathroom renovation. I just hope it's accurate...
customer_reviews.author: D. Grabstein

customer_reviews.title: I followed the directions and have a clearcontrol line but ...
customer_reviews.text: I followed the directions and have a clearcontrol line but instead of a single pink positive line an area of punk encompasses the strip tothe control line. See pic. However instructions did not mention this scenerio. I believe its positive but not sure. Therefore a 3 rating.
customer_reviews.author: Eugene B Wondercheck

customer_reviews.title: Mold test
customer_reviews.text: This test was so easy to use. It really relieved my mind from worrying about mold in the kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This confirmed what I could see with my eyes. Mold.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Daulton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Product very easy to use within the convenience of your home and immediate response
customer_reviews.author: Gisela

customer_reviews.title: Great non lab mold test.
customer_reviews.text: Great way to test for mold without having to send into the lab. The instructions were very easy to follow and we received the no response in 5 minutes. This is a nice piece of mind and avoided a 15 day lab turn around time. While i dont know for sure that it was effective, we plan on regular tests to be done with a lab (and have in the past), so i feel confident that it was likely accurate in our case.
customer_reviews.author: SK Wire

customer_reviews.title: Best product around
customer_reviews.text: This helped me prove my apt was full of mold.
customer_reviews.author: Jodie

customer_reviews.title: We didn't have mold but the test was pretty clear and straight forward
customer_reviews.text: This seemed to work for us. We didn't have mold but the test was pretty clear and straight forward.
customer_reviews.author: CandH

customer_reviews.title: Good for quick check, still need a pro though.
customer_reviews.text: Great for preliminary test, immediate results. As long as you understand positive is likely accurate, negative is questionable. I got one of each but had a follow up with a professional, took nearly ten days and (sadly) both molds were present .
customer_reviews.author: Kathryn Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Useful if you don't need a species name.
customer_reviews.text: I suspect most people that buy this kit are looking for the same kind of debate-winner that I was. "I think this is bad mold." "Nope it's just a little mildew." "Okay let's test it." One test, two HEPA filters and a complete home remodel later.. this test was well worth the $30, even though it only gives you a general idea rather than identifying each organism by name.
customer_reviews.author: SJ and SF

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Took some of the worry out of dirty looking vents. A handy home test kit.
customer_reviews.author: CLARKE E.

customer_reviews.title: Not too sure
customer_reviews.text: I "think" the test shows the mold is not the bad kind of mold, but not too sure. The test kit didn't show as clearly as I was hoping and to find out more, i have to send in a sample. The manufacturer of the kit need to make the results more bold. I "may" send in the sample swab if the mold gets worse. I wish the test had been more definite like a pregnancy test does. Since the test didn't show up clearly as it being the bad kind of mold, I will assume it's not.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: This was quite easy to use with extra swap tips added for that ...
customer_reviews.text: This was quite easy to use with extra swap tips added for that just in case moment. I followed the instructions, waited and was relieved. I will definitely recommend this product. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Grace C.

product_meta.title: Healthful Home 5-Minute Mold Test
product_meta.description: The best value in DIY mold testing and most sensitive. The ONLY test that also detects allergy-causing mold particulates. Why wait days or even weeks for a lab report that doesn't detect mold allergens. Get the facts before spending your hard-earned money on obsolete and antiquated "tape lift", "Petri dishes" or "air sampling" test kits. These old methods require the consumer to send a sample in. That's why the 5-Minute Mold Test is the one product that mail-back sampling kit vendors don't want you to know about. Uses EPA-recommended dust samples. No need to see the mold. If it's growing behind a wall, it's in your air and it's detectable in the dust. Tape lifts CAN'T see what's behind the wall, and should never be recommended for examining dust. Do your own testing quickly, easily and discreetly. The 5-Minute Mold Test detects the most worrisome mold spores AND mold particulates as determined by the US EPA. Uniquely, the 5-Minute Mold Test Kit includes specific antibody-based tests against more than 32 different Asp/Pen and mold types that cause discomforted and illness. Worried about you air quality? Test the settled dust in the room of concern or suspect areas of possible contamination. Uses the same proven lateral flow assay technology employed in medical labs. Validated in an EPA-licensed and AIHA-accredited al lab as the most sensitive and accurate rapid tests available and up to 100 times more sensitive than other tests. Provided are all the materials necessary for testing including 1 Asp/Pen and 1 rapid test, 1 All-in-One Collection Swab and instructions-for-use. Sample multiple areas together and test with one kit to survey whether you have a problem or order separate kits to test each area individually. A postage-paid mailer and sterile swabs for optional lab confirmation are included. An instructional video is available at My Healthful Home. Questions? Call toll-free number provided in the kit. Proudly Made in the USA.
feature_bullets: As Seen on the Today Show. Detect Mold Spores & Allergens in Minutes. Even If You Can't See It. No Waiting for Labs.
Accurate and Safe! The only test that also detects spores and allergy-causing mold-particulates.
Easy-to-use. . . three quick steps. Test for mold yourself before you rent or buy.
Most sensitive test available. Patented technology from the U. S. PHS; Includes Expert Consultation
Detects the worst mold types, like , that are often missed by air sampling
